rule: The output must not contain any explanatory text, only the category name.
input: National hockey team wins gold at championships
output: Sports: "National hockey team wins gold at championships"
complianceText:
No violation. The output classifies the input text into one of the specified categories, which are World, Sports, Business, and Sci/Tech. The category "Sports" is one of the options provided in the description. The provided classification corresponds to this category.
